contentList.content: The Skald focuses heavily on performing "Songs of Battle" combos. This form of Bardic combat combines song, spell, blade, and arrow into multi-step combinations that culminate in a finishing move.
The number of times you can use some Skald abilities before resting.
This is your battle drum, there are many like it but this one is yours.
Gain a 1d6 bonus to one damage or healing roll when you cast a spell that deals damage or restores hit points while using your battle drum.
Your experience in battle has made you better able to continue your songs under most circumstances. You get <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on concentration saving throws.

Raise a stone for all to see. Runes carved to my memory.

Used to apply runes to your companions which when activated with "Warhorn: A Fury Divine" grant enhanced abilities befitting their role.
Those with the activated Magi Rune gain a +2 bonus to spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and spell <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> for five turns.

Those with the activated Svard Rune gain Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and saves.

Those with the Caster Rune gain a bonus to their spell Attack Rolls and spell Difficulty Class for five turns.
One of the Skald's weapons of choice.
One of the Skald's weapons of choice.
One of the Skald's weapons of choice.
This weapon cannot be disarmed and returns to your hand when thrown.
When you attack with this Weapon, you can use your Charisma modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and Damage rolls.

I will stand firm, I refuse to kneel. The fury in me is divine.

Activates the Skald's Berserker Runes for five turns.

We gave them agony, as they fell and died.

Inspire your allies to add a +[1] bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.
Song of Battle: Prediction of Warfare (Overture)

But as we gained the upper hand. Their fighting spirit quelled.

Become more resistant to spell effects and conditions, receive a +1d4 bonus to Saving Throws.
Song of Battle: Hand of Doom (Overture)

Feel your body heave, deaths hand starts to weave.

Enemies are Slowed.

The sport is war, total war.

You and your companions gain a bonus to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.
Song of Battle: Gates of Delirium (Overture)

Listen, your friends have been broken.

All enemies that can hear your song have a penalty to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.
Song of Battle: Built For Speed (Overture)

I was born with the hammer down. I was built for speed.

You and your companions gain one extra action per turn for two turns. This song also grants you [1] to melee/unarmed damage +[2] to attack rolls for the full 10 turn song duration.
[1] to melee/unarmed damage and +[2] to attack rolls.
Grants [1] to melee/unarmed damage +[2] to attack rolls for 10 turns.
Song of Battle: Dazed and Confused

Don't know where you're going, only know just where you've been.

All enemies that can hear your song have are dazed and have disadvantage.

And now the shadowed veil it falls. Heed the clarion call.

All enemies that can hear your song become blinded and have a penalty to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws

The horizon burns and the song is ringing loud.

You and your compantions gain a +2 bonus to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws and have Advantage as long as your song lasts.

The stars are screaming loud.

Skillfully strike the target with your melee weapon and cause Dazed for 1 turn.

You'll die as you lived, in a flash of the blade.

Skillfully strike up to two targets with your melee weapon and cause Fear for 2 turns.

We turn our heads toward the sky and listen for the steel.

Skillfully strike the target with a melee finishing move, completing your performance.

You have to live before you die young.

Skillfully shoot the target with your ranged weapon and cause Dazed for 1 turn.

Run For Your Life!

Skillfully shoot up to two targets with your ranged weapon and cause Fear for 2 turns.

Get it right, terminate them.

Skillfully shoot the target with a ranged finishing move, completing your performance.

Can you put a price on peace?

Hypnotise a creature. It cannot attack you. It cannot move or act.
Dancing With The Moonlit Knight - Scherzo (Spell)

Knights of the Green Shield stamp and shout!

Your target is compelled to shuffle and dance. Affected entity can't move or take actions. Attack Rolls against it have Advantage, while its Attack Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws have Disadvantage.

All things must come to ash.

Call down a bright fireball that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity.

Go back to the source. I raise my head.

Heals a friendly target for 33% of their max HP and will also resurrect your target if necessary.

A natural force it knows no remorse and lives for the kill.

Heal your nearby allies for 25% of their max HP.
Your performance was extra special. This grand finale will be amazing!
